text: Arau yisakale tomalokara dbinara anusarana karae te'omlokara bahirae ana kako bisbasa nakaraiba’. Koraa, ‘allahara nirdesita pathe'i ekamatra patha. E'ito e'i babe ye, tomalokaka yito diya haiche seya anako diba parae athaba tomalokara pratipalakara sanmukhata sihamte tomalokara lagata bitarka karaiba’. Koraa, ‘niscaya anugraha allahara hatata te'om yaka iccha taka se'ito pradana karae; arau allaha praacuryamaya, sarbajna
